name: dbo.mutual_fund_transactions
query: CREATE VIEW dbo.mutual_fund_transactions AS SELECT     mf.fund_id,     mf.fund_name,     t.transaction_id,     t.transaction_date,     t.amount,     t.transaction_type FROM dbo.mutual_funds AS mf INNER JOIN dbo.transactions AS t     ON mf.fund_id = t.fund_id;
